text: Bill Mathis (December 10, 1938 â€“ October 20, 2020) was an American college and professional football player.Bill Mathis Statistics - Pro-Football- Reference.com He played for the New York Jets between 1960 to 1969. Mathis was born in Rocky Mount, North Carolina. After his sports career, he became a Wall Street executive. Mathis died on October 20, 2020 at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:New York Jets players Category:Sportspeople from North Carolina Category:Businesspeople from North Carolina Category:Sportspeople from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Businesspeople from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:People from Rocky Mount, North Carolina
